item.title: Audio Visualization
item.description: I’ve been meaning to delve into the Web Audio API for a while, but I didn’t know enough about Canvas to do anything interesting. Until now! The javascript can be found here. Oscillocope Frequency Bars The code is mostly a standard use of the API, but I did run into one problem: the Analyser’s frequency data is linear, but human hearing is logarithmic. Displaying the raw frequency data would result in 6 octaves (of the 10 that healthy human ears can hear) being condensed into about 6% of the graph.
